headline: Albemarle Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Albemarle Corporation (NYSE: ALB) announced today that it declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.405 per share. The dividend, which has an annualized rate of $1.62, is payable April 1, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business as of March 14, 2025.

headline: McKinsey sees lithium demand stabilising and expects next upcycle
summary: Investing.com -- McKinsey’s said lithium prices appear to have bottomed, with demand growth accelerating beyond electric vehicles due to rapid expansion in stationary storage. The comments, made during a Bloomberg-hosted review, is similar to Albemarle’s estimate that stationary storage now accounts for about 20% of lithium demand.

headline: The London Company Large Cap Vs. Russell 1000 Value Full Year 2024 Commentary
summary: The London Company Large Cap portfolio returned 15.8% year-to-date vs. a 14.4% increase in the Russell 1000 Value Index.
